mapper.select: SELECT b.bookname, wu.realname as feedBackName, bc.id, bc.book_id, bc.content, bc.is_auth as result, pu.realname as authorname, bc.author_reply, bc.auth_date, DATE_FORMAT(bc.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%I:%S') as gmt_create FROM book AS b Inner Join book_user_feedback AS bc ON b.id = bc.book_id left join writer_user wu on bc.user_id = wu.id left join pmph_user pu on bc.author_id = pu.id WHERE bc.is_deleted = '0' and bc.id = #{id}

select DISTINCT a.id, b.bookname, b.author, b.publish_date, b.image_url , a.page, a.line , a.content , a.attachment, a.attachment_name, d.realname, a.gmt_create , a.is_author_replied, a.author_reply , a.is_editor_handling , a.is_editor_replied , a.editor_reply, a.result from book_correction a LEFT JOIN book b on b.id = a.book_id LEFT JOIN book_editor c on c.book_id = a.book_id LEFT JOIN writer_user d on d.id = a.user_id where b.id is not null and !a.is_deleted and a.id = #{id}
